title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing embers in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing coal in a dream and coal burning Coal and seeing coal in a dream has many different interpretations and most people who see coal in a dream are afraid, although seeing coal in a dream is a sign of the proximity of glaucoma. That comes especially to someone in need. It can refer to jewelry, counting money, and it can refer to a seeker of knowledge. In this article, we will give you all possible interpretations about seeing coal in a dream. Interpretation of coals in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing coals in a dream indicates that the thing is hastened, prepared, and ready, and that the dreamer is asking for it. Whoever sees that he benefits from burning embers in a dream will receive food without getting tired, and coal in dreams also has limited funds. Seeing charcoal in a dream can indicate knowledge, research, and struggle, as God knows. Interpretation of embers in a dream for a single woman: To see a girl walking over embers without getting burned, this indicates the difficulties that this girl faces, but she will overcome them with merit, and she will have a prominent position and position and achieve What you want. If he sees that he is walking on coals and feels pain, this may indicate a problem or illness and he will receive treatment. Seeing red coals may indicate the temptation and temptation of this girl’s youth. And if he sees that he is eating coals, this indicates that he has committed many sins. Interpretation Embers in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself walking over hot embers without getting hurt or harmed, this means that she bears many responsibilities in life and endures hardships and tribulations and that God will save her and replace her with much goodness, health and happiness in the coming period. Of her life. If she sees that she is being burned by embers or that the embers are burning her clothes, this indicates fears, sorrows, or health problems. If she sees that she and her husband are walking on hot embers, this may indicate many difficulties, problems, and differences in marital life. If she sees that she She extinguishes the fire of embers, this indicates that she has overcome difficulties and prospered and is in good health and happy. Igniting burning charcoal to cook food can cause temptation with obscene words and inappropriate actions. Interpretation of embers in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman notices that she is walking on hot embers, this indicates On the difficulties that she will face during pregnancy and childbirth, and the birth may falter. If the embers are out, this means that they have passed this critical period and it makes delivery easier. Seeing charcoal in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will endure the hardships of living with her husband and go through difficult periods, then God will compensate her With goodness. Interpretation of embers in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman walking on hot embers may indicate that she has overcome the difficulties and obstacles she faces. If a hot flame strikes her and burns her clothes or body, this indicates health, moral and psychological problems. Seeing someone burning in the flame indicates difficulties that This person faces her. If she sees that she is extinguishing the flame of the ember, this indicates the passage of crises and difficult situations and the improvement of her circumstances.

title: Interpretation of a camera in a dream and photography with a camera in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a camera is one of the visions that shows awakening, such as being photographed with a camera, taking a selfie, someone watching surveillance cameras, buying a new camera, or someone photographing me for a single woman, for a married woman. The pregnant woman for a man by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and more interpretations. Interpretation of a camera in a dream If you dream of a camera, a camera, this means that changes will happen to you and you will find yourself in an inappropriate environment and you will be surrounded by deceitful people. And if a girl dreams that she is taking pictures with a camera, this predicts that Her current future will bring with her a lot of unhappiness and that her boyfriend will expose her to serious disappointment. The camera in the dream is eyes that watch, observe and explore, and in the interpretation it is eyes directed towards the viewer, and the camera can show some people’s interest in the viewer’s affairs and the details of his life. Out of curiosity or love, and sometimes a surveillance camera shows envy, jealousy, and gossip. A camera in a dream is similar in its interpretation to photographic lenses, and its interpretation varies depending on the place where it is placed. Seeing a camera in the home is an expression in a dream of conservatism, safety, and security. Seeing a surveillance camera in the kitchen indicates security in matters. Related to livelihood and income, it is in the interpretation of safety, preservation and security in livelihood. If one sees the camera in the living room of his house or in the living room, this indicates voyeurism or intrusion by some nearby viewers. Life is a cause of turmoil and harm, and it is not worth interpreting for the sleeper to see in his dream as if a camera was placed or placed in a corner of the bedroom, because these cameras may express the intrusion of some people or their unjustified violation of the viewer’s privacy. The bedroom, in its interpretation, is a symbol of calm and comfort of the dreamer, and its meaning in the dream is privacy. If a married woman sees that a camera surrounds her in her bedroom, this may indicate the interference and closeness of some strangers in her married life, and they are often jealous and hateful, or looking for quarrels and slander. If a married or unmarried woman discovers a secret camera installed in a hidden place In her bedroom, she must, on the alert, take careful measures and avoid exposing certain people whose faith, friendship, and reliability are questionable and too conservative in dealings. And behavior towards others. If a married or unmarried woman sees in her dream that she discovers the location of a hidden surveillance camera, then in waking life she discovers a person’s deception or conspiracy. She does not like a surveillance camera in a dream if the dreamer sees it installed in a very private place, such as a bathroom, shower or “The shower.” If a married woman or a single girl sees a camera watching her while she is showering, this is a bad interpretation because this dream may indicate that something was revealed to people and the woman wanted to hide it. If the surveillance camera is secret or hidden, then the matter here is more dangerous and may express some embarrassment that the insightful person may be exposed to, whether she is married, divorced, widowed, or single. These dreams may represent the revelation of secrets

title: Interpretation of seeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream in which a sheep dreamed. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a sheep in a dream as a reference to a good son for his mother and father. And whoever sees in a dream that someone gives him a sheep in a dream, and his wife is pregnant in reality, this dream foretells to him that God will bless him with a good son and his mother. And we see a small sheep in The dream, this indicates strength, youth, and the life he lives, which is dominated by acquaintance, making new friends, and love. And whoever sees in a dream that he is slaughtering a sheep, this dream indicates the death of someone close to him and whom he loves, it could be his friend or relative. Interpretation of seeing one sheep The unmarried woman Whoever sees a sheep in a dream, this may refer to the person who proposes to her, but he may be a weak-minded groom who is unable to make decisions without consulting her, which means that he is a person who does so. He does not have the will, but he is financially capable. Whoever sees in a dream a small, white sheep, this indicates that her son-in-law is presented to her with a weak personality and she cannot control him. Seeing a black sheep in a dream suggests entering into a fleeting romantic relationship, and the dream could be a sign of youth. And beauty and elegance. There are those who interpreted seeing a brown sheep in a dream as referring to first love. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a married woman’s dream: A pregnant woman who sees her husband giving her a white sheep in a dream, this may be a sign of an imminent pregnancy. As for whoever sees a dead person who presented it to her in Dreaming with a white sheep, this is a sign of the continuation of charity given to the dead. As for catching a sheep and feeding it in a dream, this indicates a covenant with one that has not been fulfilled. As for her seeing her father or brother offering her a sheep, this indicates an abundance of sustenance. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream: Seeing a lamb in The dream indicates that the newborn in the dream is male, and God knows best, and seeing a lot of sheep indicates the number of months remaining for the pregnant woman. Seeing a black sheep in a dream means sustenance and money. Interpretation of seeing a small sheep in a dream: Seeing a small sheep in a dream indicates a kind, obedient, and fair boy with his parents. The young virgin sheep appears, and in general, seeing young sheep indicates blessing and goodness in the life of the dreamer and shows the satisfaction of desires. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing a sheep in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end. article and we will give you the explanation as soon as possible.

The young lamb appears as a virgin, and in general, seeing young lambs indicates blessing and goodness in the life of the dreamer and shows the fulfillment of desires. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing a lamb in a dream. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi. People are searching for an interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi. Ayat al-Kursi is considered one of the best verses and surahs of the Qur’an, and therefore there are different interpretations of this vision. Reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream by Ibn SirinWhen we see that we are reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream, there are different interpretations of this vision, and among the most confirmed interpretations We take without discussion the interpretations of Imam Ibn Sirin, and among them we mention: Seeing the recitation of Ayat al-Kursi in a dream indicates the approach of goodness and blessing for the pioneer, as most of the Qur’an in a dream comes from good visions. Reciting Ayat al-Kursi from a dream by Ibn Sirin is among the good visions that indicate the recovery of the sick person. And relief from the crises and tribulations that the dreamer is exposed to in his life. If a person sees that he is reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream and faces many problems and difficulties in his life, then this vision is evidence of the approach to solving these problems and getting rid of them. Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi, according to the translator Ibn Sirin, this indicates However, the dreamer is always preoccupied with fear for his children and wants to protect them from everything. If the dreamer memorizes Ayat al-Kursi and repeats it often, this is a sign that the dreamer is a very intelligent and quick person. Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi by Ibn Shaheen. The great scholar and translator Ibn Shaheen has put forward different interpretations. In the field of this vision, all of its interpretations are considered good and promising for goodness, sustenance, blessing, and healing, God willing. Among these interpretations are: If the dreamer is suffering from an illness and sees in his dream that he is reciting Ayat al-Kursi, then this vision indicates a quick and imminent recovery, God willing, from this illness. If one sees In a dream, he is reciting Ayat al-Kursi, and indeed he has an inheritance and inheritance that he has not been able to obtain yet, so this vision is a good omen that he will obtain it soon. If in a dream you recite Surah Al-Baqarah in its entirety along with Ayat Al-Kursi, then this vision is an indication of the long life that the dreamer will enjoy and the abundance of his actions for the sake of goodness and goodness in his life. Ibn Shaheen indicates that seeing a pregnant woman reciting Ayat Al-Kursi is evidence of her fear for her health and pregnancy. But God reassures her through this vision. Reading Ayat al-Kursi in an unmarried girl’s dream. A small, different website. A different group of interpretations for seeing a verse reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream, such as: Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her closeness to God, her striving to be satisfied with Him, and her attempt to stay away. About committing sins and disobedience. Reading Ayat Al-Kursi or Surat Al-Baqarah in general in a dream is evidence of salvation from the evil eye and freedom from envy and immunity. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone is reading Surat Al-Baqarah to her and she hesitates with him, then this vision is a sign that she is approaching... Marrying a righteous man who has memorized the Book of God and its teachings. But if a girl memorizes Ayat al-Kursi for a group of children, this vision indicates that she is immune from the evil eye and cured of the diseases she suffers from. Reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a pregnant woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates to

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about crying over a dead person while he is alive, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about crying over a dead person while he is alive is often searched for; As it is a common dream that carries many meanings, the most important of which is the dreamer’s relationship with the person he sees in his sleep and his interest in his affairs, and there is a group of interpretations that have been included in the sayings. From scholars, they differed according to the details provided, so let us get to know them. The interpretation of a dream about crying over a dead person while he is alive according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about crying over a dead person while he is alive? It is really annoying to find someone you know who is truly alive as if he had died in a dream. She starts crying for him. Recovery time. Crying for the dead in a dream while he is sick is a sign of his longevity, and he will quickly recover from his illness, especially if the crying was just tears and Noel was not heard. If he is a friend or relative of the dreamer, then there is disagreement and disagreement between them that will lead to a break for a while, and the best Seeking help from a wise man before the problem gets worse. If the dreamer is single, there are positive changes that will happen to him, and it is a sign of success in study and work, provided that he cries without crying. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google. The Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site includes thousands of interpretations by major interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about crying over a dead person while he is alive, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said: The crying of a dead person is, in fact, evidence of his desire to repent and return to the path of truth, and it is a form of repentance for the sins he has committed. Seeing a responsible person in this dream means that he He is in great trouble as a result of his failure in many of the decisions he made recently, which had adverse and unexpected results. The Imam said that if crying is for your master and doer in this life, it is a good omen that your position will rise and your status will rise and you will receive a great reward in the near future. But if you are disobedient, you must quickly return, and if you are obedient, then perform more acts of worship that will save you from the torment of Hell. Interpretation of dreams about crying for death while alive for a single woman. If a girl sees this vision, its interpretations vary according to the circumstances and psychological state she is going through. She will soon marry a man of religion and morals, as compensation for those years that passed, in sadness and pain. But if she studied and was afraid of the upcoming exams, this is a sign that the exam will be easy and she will get the highest grades. But if she cried in a burning voice and her crying was loud, then she regrets the The mistakes she committed in the past are still casting a shadow over her reality and creating problems in her relationship with others. If the girl is engaged, there are some obstacles that stand between her and consummating the marriage. In most cases, she does not want to consummate this relationship, but is forced to do so. Interpretation of a dream about a dead man crying while he is on his bed. Survival for a married woman: If a married woman sees that one of her children has died, this is a type of obsession that controls her because of her excessive attachment to her children, and these obsessions should not push her so that she is not affected by this. In the event of the death of an old friend of hers, she may...

title: Interpretation of seeing the symbol of Türkiye in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of the symbol of Turkey in a dream, completing the correct interpretations of Ibn Sirin. Turkey is one of the Islamic countries that attracts millions of tourists annually and many people want to visit it and see its wonderful tourist places. We are thinking about traveling to it, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of the symbol of Turkey in a dream, the correct and comprehensive interpretations of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a trip to Turkey in a dream for a single woman. One of the promising visions for an unmarried girl is that she dreams that she is traveling to Turkey. This dream means that a person will propose to her, and this person has good morals, and is well off, and she will live happily with him, God willing, and this girl must seek the help of God Almighty to show her what is. title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing an old house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about climbing an old house in a dream In case you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about climbing an old house in a dream, there are a large number of connotations and interpretations of dreams, and we find that scholars and diligent people in general are looking for interpretations, and the site managers do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather broadcast the scholars’ interpretations Interpretation of a dream about climbing an old house in a dream. Anyone who dreams of climbing an old house in a dream can indicate a disaster or sadness that the dreamer may face at that time. A person’s dream that he was climbing an old house may indicate the dreamer’s attempt to overcome some obstacles and difficulties in his life during that time. Days. If a person saw that he was trying to climb a wall, this may indicate some of the obstacles and obstacles that the dreamer faced in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a tree in a dream: Anyone who dreams of climbing a tall tree may indicate the happiness and joys that he will feel. The dreamer has it in his life at that time. Dreaming of climbing trees in a dream may indicate happy events that come to the dreamer during this period. Climbing trees in a dream can indicate the honor that the dreamer will receive and a lot of pride. If one sees himself climbing a tree in a dream This may indicate the will and determination that the dreamer had in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the moon rising in a dream: It is possible that seeing the moon rising in a dream indicates that he is a just person who loves goodness for everyone. If a person sees himself rising The moon is in a dream, this may indicate many happy things that are happening in his life at that time. Seeing the moon rising in a dream can mean good changes that are happening in your life these days. Seeing the moon rising in a dream means getting rid of anxiety and worry that The dreamer was suffering from it at that time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing the Kaaba in a dream: Seeing someone climbing the roof of the Kaaba may indicate good skin that the dreamer will acquire during these days. It is possible that seeing someone climbing the Kaaba in a dream indicates the dreamer’s sins and he must repent and approach God, Blessed and Most High. Standing On the roof of the Kaaba in a dream may indicate some stumbles and obstacles in one’s life during this time, and God knows best. A person’s dream that he was standing at the door of the Kaaba may indicate the abundance of goodness that he will obtain in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a large rock In a dream: Climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate working hard to achieve goals and ambitions during this time. Seeing yourself climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s achievements in life during this period. A person’s dream that he was climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate A promotion at work or a position will be acquired by the dreamer during that period. If one saw that he was climbing a large rock in a dream, he will overcome the difficulties and problems that the dreamer is facing at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a rock.

title: Interpretation of seeing sour cream in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream or in a dream, seeing cream in a dream for a single and married woman, meanings of cream in a dream for a man. Seeing a generous person in a dream indicates great sustenance and a lot of goodness for the pioneer. Seeing a generous person in a dream is one of the good visions that foretells blessings and money. Seeing a cream in a dream and eating it symbolizes the death of their distress and relief. Seeing a lot of cream in a dream indicates great goodness and a lot of money that the dreamer will obtain. Seeing buying cream in a dream announces its profits from a lawful and blessed source. Seeing a drop of cream and throwing it on the ground, it indicates that the dreamer has been subjected to a major test in his life. Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream for a single woman. Seeing cream in a dream for a single woman indicates that she will share and share it soon. Seeing women alone eating cream in a dream indicates that he achieves his goals and fulfills his ambitions. Seeing someone giving it to her Cream in a dream: It indicates good news that you will hear in the near future. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream with cream with jam indicates happiness, joy, and achieving something that you wanted very much. Seeing a single woman with spoiled cream in a dream says that she is exposed to distress, crises, and major problems. Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream A dream for a married woman: Seeing cream in a dream for a married woman. It is mentioned that he has a great source of livelihood and a lot of money. Seeing a married woman making cream in a dream indicates the presence of good things and occasions of joy and happiness for her family. Seeing a married woman cooking food with cream indicates comfort, tranquility and happiness with her husband. A married woman sees Her husband gives her a plate of cream. It confirms her husband’s interest in her, the intensity of his love and attachment, and his continuous efforts to make her happy. Seeing spoiled cream in a dream for a married woman indicates major marital problems until separation. Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing cream in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates kindness, blessings, and nourishment. Seeing extracted cream in a dream for a pregnant woman symbolizes the ease of her birth and the safety of her fetus. Seeing cream in a dream for a pregnant woman announces that she will give birth to a child as she wishes. Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream for a man. Seeing cream and honey in a dream for a man indicates his marriage to a woman who has morals and piety. Seeing a man buying cream In a dream, it indicates many good offspring. A man who sees white cream in a dream announces that he has achieved the goals and desires that he pursues. Seeing a man with cream and milk in a dream symbolizes the great benefit he receives from someone close to him. Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream of dead people. Seeing cream in a dream About the dead is one of the praiseworthy visions that heralds good news for the dead. Seeing a noble person in a dream about the dead announces that he is in a high position with God and receives blessings.

title: Interpretation of the letter Ta in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the appearance of the letter Ta in a dream or a dream through the website Roy2a.com. The letter Ta is one of the 28 letters of the Arabic alphabet and the letter Ta is the third letter in a row and it varies. Seeing the letter Ta in a dream is possible for the dreamer to see the letter Ta’ in the summary or things with a definition. Ta', all of which have connotations, and today we will present the most important interpretations that came from the great scholars in dream interpretation, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of the letter Ta in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin says that he saw the letter Ta in a dream. Point to goodness. And the benefits are for the fortune teller. Seeing the letter T in a person’s dream indicates that he is approaching marriage or a new job. Seeing fruit indicates the letter T, such as figs or apples and the like, is a sign of lawful nutrition, happiness, and goodness. Seeing the letter T in a dream indicates obedience and compliance with divine commands. See another interpretation: Name The state with the letter S. Interpretation of the letter T in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing the letter T in a dream. A person’s worries are a sign of the relief of his worries and the collapse of his problems. Seeing the letter T written on the wall in a dream indicates that it is a sign of happiness and kindness that he will receive from God. Seeing the letter t indicates the debtor at the end of his debts and livelihood. Nearby. Seeing a coffin in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. If a person sleeps in it, this is an indication that he has attained an important position. Seeing an empty coffin in a dream is to fulfill desires and dreams in the life of the fortuneteller who seeks. Seeing a crown in a dream is a metaphor for pride, prestige, and high status, and an indication of the knowledge and knowledge that the viewer acquires in His life. Seeing a lupine in a dream is a sign of poverty and need, and a sick person is a sign of death or an increase in his illness. Seeing the Tashahhud in prayer in the dreamer’s good condition, happiness, kindness, and the fulfillment of dreams. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing names in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of the letter Ta in a dream for Nablus. Seeing a hill or hills in a dream. It indicates the high status and prestige that the dreamer enjoys. Walking in the hills is a sign of the collapse of anxiety and sadness. Seeing greetings and peace in a dream is a sign that bad things will be removed from the dreamer’s life and happiness and prosperity will be achieved. Seeing berries in a dream means abundance of sustenance, offspring, and money, and berries are a sign of multiple goodness and benefits. In the life of the seer. A dragon in a dream. A sign of influence and power and turning into a dragon is a sign that the seer will live a long time. Seeing figs in a dream increases nutrition, money and happiness in the life of the seer, and white figs are more worthy of praise in a dream than black figs. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a kiss On the head in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the words with the letter T in a dream. Seeing dates in a dream if the sick person eats them is a sign of his recovery and good health in his body. Seeing dates in a dream indicates a single woman is approaching her engagement. Seeing corrupt dates in a dream indicates many sins, transgressions, and a bad reputation. Enlarging the dream is a sign of victory. Against enemies, sincere repentance, and many blessings

title: Interpretation of seeing leprosy in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: A large number of jurists said that this dream is undesirable and carries disturbing interpretations for the dreamer, because it indicates evil and the evil that befalls and afflicts him. Among the interpretations of this dream: If one sees leprosy in a dream, this indicates deviation from the path of truth and doing bad things. It also indicates bad and evil things. Leprosy in a dream indicates that the dreamer is facing many problems in the current period. If the leper walks on The wall, this indicates the presence of a group of people saying bad and false things about the dreamer. Like any dream, because it carries evil, it also carries within it goodness and righteousness. The best thing about this dream is that if the dreamer is able to kill him, this means that he will get rid of his enemies. Interpretation of seeing leprosy in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream in more than one way and situations, until his interpretation was complete and detailed, as he said: The dream indicates that there is someone close From the dreamer will mislead him and encourage him to do bad things. Seeing a leper in a dream blowing on the dreamer’s body or approaching him means that the dreamer will contract a disease in the coming days. If the leper stands on the dreamer’s money, this indicates exposure to a major loss in money. When the leper appears on the hand The dreamer or his foot, this indicates the presence of a person close to the dreamer who does not love him and has feelings of hatred in his heart and works to harm him in any way and tries to put him in trouble and obstacles. If the dreamer is a married woman, this indicates the presence of problems and disagreements between her and her husband, and if she is unable to kill him Ibn Sirin said: These disputes may potentially lead to divorce. Leprosy approaching one of the dreamer’s children indicates that the son will be harmed and the dreamer must be careful and vigilant. Ibn Sirin explained: Leprosy in a dream indicates fears and sad things that will soon strike the dreamer’s heart. Interpretation of seeing leprosy in A dream about NabulsiImam Nabulsi indicates that this dream is undesirable and undesirable because it carries some bad things, and the interpretations are as follows: Al-Nabulsi agreed with Ibn Sirin in this case and said: Seeing leprosy in a dream indicates that you are walking on the wrong path and moving away from the truth. The presence of leprosy in The house refers to the person who speaks ill of the dreamer. Killing the leper indicates getting rid of the bad things that surround the dreamer. A leprosy bite indicates many fears and problems that the dreamer will face in the coming period. Leprosy patients leaving the house indicates new beginnings that the person will go through after a while. A long period of worries and problems. If leprosy swells in food, then this dream warns the dreamer of his forbidden money that was obtained by unlawful and unlawful means. Killing a leper shows that the dreamer has sufficient strength and courage. A leper eating human flesh in a dream means that he will be subjected to backbiting. And gossip around him, so he should be careful. The presence of leprosy on the dreamer’s clothes indicates that he will receive a gift from one of his acquaintances, which is new clothes. The passage of leprosy on the dreamer’s body indicates that the dreamer will
